analyzed: lo/_//dad brtshon 'gro rnams sgral 'dod pas/_/bsod nams tshhogs ni sngon

analyzed: pad zla'i gdan stengs su/_/a las yum mchog gos dkar mo/_/mtshhal

analyzed: mdog 'gying bcas 'dzum zhing sgeg_/thugs khar pad ma ra ga'i/_/bum pa

analyzed: skyil krung dang bcas bum pa 'dzin/_/de'i g.yon du pad zla'i steng /_/swa

analyzed: rin chen tshhe dpag med/_/btsho ma gser mdog skyil krung bzhugs/_/bum

analyzed: bsnams shing skyil krung bzhugs/_/nub tu pad ma nyi ma yi/_/steng du bru las

analyzed: 'khor lor gyur/_/de las snang mdzad tshhe dpag med/_/dkar zhing skyil krung

analyzed: gyis mdzes/_/thugs khar bum pa 'dzin pa'o/_/shar khyams zla ba'i gdan

analyzed: stengs su/_/hum bzhi rdo rje bzhir gyur pas/_/rdo rje rigs kyi sems dpa' bzhi//

analyzed: g.yas pa rang rtags rdo rje 'dzin/_/g.yon pa tshhe'i bum pa 'dzin/_/rgyan

analyzed: rin chen 'bar ba bzhi/_/rin chen rigs kyi sems par gyur/_/g.yas pa

analyzed: rin chen g.yon pa na/_/tshhe'i bum pa thugs khar 'dzin/_/btsho ma gser 'dra

analyzed: skyil krung bzhugs/_/nub du pad zla hri bzhi las/_/pad ma 'dab lngar gyur

analyzed: pa las/_/pad ma'i sems dpa' bzhi ru 'gyur/_/phyag g.yas rang rtags
translated: from which arise the four lotus bodhisattvas.🔽Their right hands hold their individual lotus,

original: pad ma bsnams/_/g.yon pa bum 'dzin rgyan spras shing /_/skyil krung dag gis
analyzed: pad ma bsnams/_/g.yon pa bum 'dzin rgyan spras shing /_/skyil krung dag gis
translated: and their left hands hold vases. They are adorned and🔽sit in vajra posture.

analyzed: bzhugs pa'o/_/byang du gdan stengs a bzhi las/_/rdo rje rgya gram las gyur

analyzed: pa'i/_/las kyi sems dpa' bzhi ru gyur/_/sngo ljang rgya gram bum pa 'dzin/_/
translated: They are blue-green, hold a vajra cross and a vase,🔽are youthful, attractive, and beautiful, and sit in vajra posture.

analyzed: gzhon sgeg mdzes shing skyil krung bzhugs/_/'od zer tshhogs kyis bskor ba'o/_/

analyzed: shar sgor dza dang lcags kyu las/_/lcags kyu ma ni mu tig mdog_/lho sgor hum
translated: At the southern gate, from hūṃ and a noose,🔽the yellow noose goddess arises.🔽At the western gate, from vaṃ and a chain,🔽the red chain goddess arises.

analyzed: las zhags pa ser/_/nub du bam las lcags sgrog dmar/_/byang du ho las
translated: At the northern gate, from ho and a bell,🔽the green bell goddess arises.

original: tshhe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/
analyzed: tshhe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/
translated: The Sādhana of Amitābha🔽All those goddesses are slender, youthful, and attractive,

analyzed: dril bu ljang /_/lha mo de dag thams cad kyang /_/'khril ldem gzhon sgeg rgyan

analyzed: spras mdzes/_/zhal ni phyir gzigs bzhengs pa'o/_/gru chad bzhi la mchod
translated: On the four corners, imagine the offering goddesses,🔽in accordance with the general [practice].

analyzed: pa'i/_/lha mo spyi dang 'thun par bsam/_/de las thugs kha'i 'od zer gyis//

analyzed: rang bzhin gnas nas ye shes pa/_/'di brjod spyan ni drang bar bsam/_/hum
translated: Recite this and imagine they are invited:🔽HUM🔽Originally pure like the nature of space,

original: gdod nas rang bzhin mkha' ltar dag_/thugs rjes gzha' tshhon skur ston pa/_/
analyzed: gdod nas rang bzhin mkha' ltar dag_/thugs rjes gzha' tshhon skur ston pa/_/
translated: you display the rainbow-like body through compassion.🔽Bhagavat, supreme speech, Amitābha,

analyzed: bcom ldan gsung mchog 'od dpag med/_/rang bzhin lhun grub gzhal yas
translated: from the naturally spontaneously present celestial mansion,🔽in this excellent reflection of meditative concentration,

original: nas/_/ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dam pa 'dir/_/'gro ba'i don du spyan
analyzed: nas/_/ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dam pa 'dir/_/'gro ba'i don du spyan
translated: if you are invited for the benefit of migrating beings,

original: 'dren na/_/tshhe zad tshhe nyams bsal mdzad phyir/_/gnas 'di nyid du
analyzed: 'dren na/_/tshhe zad tshhe nyams bsal mdzad phyir/_/gnas 'di nyid du
translated: in order to clear away the exhaustion and decline of life,🔽please come to this very place.🔽The families of vajra, jewel, lotus,

original: gshegs su gsol/_/rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang /_/las kyi rigs mchog tshhe
analyzed: gshegs su gsol/_/rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang /_/las kyi rigs mchog tshhe
translated: and action,

original: dpag med/_/mchod pa'i lha mo rnams bzhi dang /_/sems pa bcu drug sgo🔽mar bcas/_/rang bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po nas/_/ting 'dzin gzugs
analyzed: dpag med/_/mchod pa'i lha mo rnams bzhi dang /_/sems pa bcu drug sgo mar bcas/_/rang bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po nas/_/ting 'dzin gzugs

analyzed: brnyan dam pa 'dir/_/tshhe dang longs spyod rgyas pa dang /_/thugs mchog ye
translated: in order to increase lifespan, enjoyments,🔽and attain the wisdom of the supreme mind,🔽I invite you to this very place

analyzed: shes thob bya'i phyir/_/gnas 'di nyid du spyan 'dren gyis/_/byin gyis brlab
translated: in order to bless🔽and request you to come.

original: phyir gshegs su gsol/_/dza hum bam hos dgug cing gzhug_/mnyes par gyur
analyzed: phyir gshegs su gsol/_/dza hum bam hos dgug cing gzhug_/mnyes par gyur
translated: Summon and absorb with jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ.🔽After they are pleased,🔽make extensive or concise offerings and praises.

original: la mchod pa dang /_/bstod pa rgyas dang bsdus pa bya/_/sku gsung thugs ni
analyzed: la mchod pa dang /_/bstod pa rgyas dang bsdus pa bya/_/sku gsung thugs ni
translated: Consecrate the body, speech, and mind.🔽Then, completely abandoning dullness and agitation,

original: byin gyis brlab/_/de nas bying rgod rab spangs la/_/ma yengs lha rnams rab
analyzed: byin gyis brlab/_/de nas bying rgod rab spangs la/_/ma yengs lha rnams rab
translated: meditate on the undistracted deities.🔽After that, the recitation is as follows:

original: tu bsgom/_/de rjes bzlas pa bya ba ni/_/lha rnams thugs kha'i bum pa'i nang //
analyzed: tu bsgom/_/de rjes bzlas pa bya ba ni/_/lha rnams thugs kha'i bum pa'i nang //
translated: In the vase at the heart of the deities,🔽from hṛiḥ, hūṃ, svā, and ya,🔽meditate on the individual mantras surrounding them.

original: hri hum swa bye a las ni/_/rang rang sngags kyis bskor bar bsgom/_/om hri bye
analyzed: hri hum swa bye a las ni/_/rang rang sngags kyis bskor bar bsgom/_/om hri bye
translated: oṃ hṛiḥ svā

analyzed: badzra dz+nya na a yu she swa ha/_om hum bye badzra snyo na a yu she swa ha/_om swa bye badzra snyo
translated: Vajra jñana ayushi swaha🔽Om hum bya vajra jñana ayushi swaha🔽Om sva bya vajra jñana ayushi swaha🔽Om rgya bya vajra jñana ayushi swaha

original: na a yu she swa ha/_om rgyu bye badzra dz+nya na a yu she swa ha/_om a bye badzra dz+ha na a yu
analyzed: na a yu she swa ha/_om rgyu bye badzra dz+nya na a yu she swa ha/_om a bye badzra dz+ha na a yu
translated: Om a bya vajra jñana ayushi swaha🔽Those are the recitation for the male deities.

original: she swa ha/_de rnams yab kyi bsnyen pa'o/_/yum gyi bum par a pa ra/_/mi ta
analyzed: she swa ha/_de rnams yab kyi bsnyen pa'o/_/yum gyi bum par a pa ra/_/mi ta
translated: In the mother’s vase, think of apa ra mi ta🔽and surround it with this mantra:

original: bsams la sngags 'dis bskor/_/om rbu a pa ra mi ta a yu dz+nya na su bi ni tshi ta🔽te tsho ra tsha ya swa ha/_yum mchog lnga'i snying po brjod/_/phyogs bcu'i sems

translated: Om rbu apa ra mi ta a yu jñana su bi ni tshi t🔽te tso ra tsha ya swa ha🔽Recite the essence mantras of the five supreme mothers.🔽Meditate on the mantras of the sixteen bodhisattvas of the ten directions🔽surrounding the vase.

analyzed: dpa' bcu drug po/_/gtsho bo'i sngags rnams bskor ba bsgom/_/dza hum bam ho

analyzed: a pa ra mi ta a yu dz+nya na su b+hi ni swa ha/_sgo ma bzhi'i snying po'o/_/de ltar bum
translated: Those are the essence mantras of the four gatekeepers.🔽In that way, by visualizing and reciting the mantras of the vases,

analyzed: pa'i sngags rnams la/_/dmigs nas bzlas pa byas pa yis/_/yig 'bru
translated: the syllables

analyzed: rnams las bdud rtshi'i rgyun/_/byung bas bum pa gang bar bsam/_/bum nang
translated: The stream of elixir flows from them and fills the vase.🔽The stream of wisdom elixir dissolves into my three places,

analyzed: ye shes bdud rtshi'i rgyun/_/rang gi gnas gsum thim pa yis/_/lus ngag yid
translated: purifying my body, speech, and mind of sickness, spirits,

analyzed: gsum nad gdon dang /_/sdig sgrib dag nas dbang bzhi thob/_/'chi med dngos grub thob par bsam/_/de nas rang gis sngags bzlas pas/_/dkyil
translated: negativity, and obscurations, and I receive the four empowerments.🔽I imagine that I have attained the siddhi of immortality.🔽Then, as I recite the mantra, I imagine that all the deities of the mandala

analyzed: 'khor lha tshhogs thams cad kyang /_/rang rang gsang sngags zlos par bsam/_/
translated: are also reciting their own secret mantras.🔽In the east of my heart, a white goddess holding a hook

analyzed: rang snying sa bon shar phyogs nas/_/lha mo dkar mo lcags kyu thogs/_/dpag
translated: emanates from the seed syllable and goes to the east.

analyzed: med shar du 'phros pa yis/_/nad gdon zhi ba'i las byas nas/_/dri za'i
translated: She performs the activity of pacifying sickness and spirits,🔽and she summons wealth from the hands of the gandharvas,🔽which dissolves into me and the vase.

analyzed: lag nas tshhe bkug nas/_/rang dang bum par bstim par bya/_/de bzhin lho'i
translated: In the same way, in the south🔽the lasso goddess emanates and performs the activity of increasing

analyzed: zhags pa las/_/tshhe dang longs spyod rgyas byas nas/_/gshin rje'i lag nas tshhe
translated: wealth and resources from the hands of the Lord of Death,🔽which dissolves into me and the vase.

analyzed: bkug nas/_/gong bzhin du ni bstim par bya/_nub kyi lcags sgrog dmar mo
translated: The red southern chain🔽subdues all three worlds without exception,

analyzed: yis/_/srid gsum ma lus dbang bsdus te/_/chu lha'i lag nas tshhe bkug
translated: and having summoned the wealth from the hands of the water spirit,🔽dissolve it and think that the naga spirits are purified.

analyzed: nas/_/bstim zhing klu gdon dag par bsam/_/byang gi dril bu dges
translated: The northern bell, the one who performs virtue,🔽having cut the life-force of sickness, spirits, and misleading demons,

analyzed: mdzad mas/_/nad gdon log 'dren tshhar bcad nas/_/gnod sbyin lag
translated: and having summoned the wealth from the hands of the yakshas,

analyzed: nas tshhe bkug nas/_/gong bzhin dmigs pa gsal bas bstim/_/shar
translated: dissolve it as before with clear visualization.🔽In the eastern vase of victory,

analyzed: phyogs rnam rgyal bum par ni/_/rdzas dang mgul chings kha rgyan bcas/_/phyag

analyzed: mtshhan bris la bzhug par bya/_/phyi ni bum pa'i rnam pa la/_/nang ni gzhal
translated: and inside is an immeasurable

analyzed: tshhe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/
translated: wealth, called the “Sādhana of Immeasurable Wealth.”🔽Think of it as the upper story,

analyzed: yas khang du bsam/_/gong bzhin bdud rtshis bum pa gang /_/de yis rang
translated: and as before, the vase is filled with ambrosia.🔽By that, all the sickness, spirits, negativities, and obscurations

original: gzhan thams cad kyi/_/nad gdon sdig sgrib sangs dag nas/_/'chi med
analyzed: gzhan thams cad kyi/_/nad gdon sdig sgrib sangs dag nas/_/'chi med
translated: of oneself and others are purified, and one attains immortality.

original: dngos grub thob par bsam/_/las bum rta mgrin bskyed pa yang /_/bgegs
analyzed: dngos grub thob par bsam/_/las bum rta mgrin bskyed pa yang /_/bgegs
translated: Also, generate Hayagriva in the activity vase and place it over the obstacles.

analyzed: rim gsal po yis/_/zla ba gcig tu sngags bzlas na/_/rtags rdzogs zla drug
translated: In this way, if you recite the mantra for one month with a clear generation stage, undistracted by self-interest or the interests of others,🔽the signs will be complete in six months and you will see the face of the deity.

original: zhal mthong 'gyur/_/de yang rgyun du nyams len na/_/kha ta'i skad kyis ma
analyzed: zhal mthong 'gyur/_/de yang rgyun du nyams len na/_/kha ta'i skad kyis ma
translated: Also, if you practice continuously, without being overcome by the sound of the katas,🔽imagine the father and mother deities in front of you.

original: non par/_/mdun du gtsho bo yab yum bsam/_/gsol ba btab la mchod
analyzed: non par/_/mdun du gtsho bo yab yum bsam/_/gsol ba btab la mchod

original: bstod bya/_/bum pa dag la dmigs nas su/_/gsang sngags nyi shu rtsha gcig
analyzed: bstod bya/_/bum pa dag la dmigs nas su/_/gsang sngags nyi shu rtsha gcig

analyzed: bzlas/_/de'i bdud rtshi'i rgyun byung nas/_/rang gi spyi gtshug thim pa yis/

original: 'chi med tshhe'i dngos grub thob/_/tshhe dpag med par gyur par bsam/_/
analyzed: 'chi med tshhe'i dngos grub thob/_/tshhe dpag med par gyur par bsam/_/
translated: You attain the siddhi of immortality and imagine that you become immeasurable life.

original: brtan pa'i yan lag sngags bzlas so/_/de yis tshhe nyid nyi zlar 'gyu/_/tshhe
analyzed: brtan pa'i yan lag sngags bzlas so/_/de yis tshhe nyid nyi zlar 'gyu/_/tshhe
translated: By that, one’s body becomes the sun and moon,🔽and what need is there to mention the experience of bliss?

original: nyams la sogs smos ci dgos/_/gsangs nas bsgrub pa rab tu bsngags/_/de
analyzed: nyams la sogs smos ci dgos/_/gsangs nas bsgrub pa rab tu bsngags/_/de
translated: The secret practice is highly recommended.🔽Next, I will explain the secret practice.

original: nas gsang sgrub bshad par bya/_/dkyil 'khor gong dang 'dra ba la/_/yab
analyzed: nas gsang sgrub bshad par bya/_/dkyil 'khor gong dang 'dra ba la/_/yab
translated: In the maṇḍala, which is the same as above,🔽the five fathers are red and wrathful,🔽adorned with various precious ornaments,

original: lnga'i sku mdog dmar zhing 'tshher/_/sna tshhogs rin chen rgyan gyis spras/_/bum
analyzed: lnga'i sku mdog dmar zhing 'tshher/_/sna tshhogs rin chen rgyan gyis spras/_/bum

analyzed: pa thod par bcas 'dzin pa/_/rdo rje skyil krungs bzhugs pa'o/_/yum lnga sku
translated: The five mothers are🔽the same color as the fathers, youthful and attractive,

translated: adorned with beautiful ornaments, with voluptuous bodies,🔽smiling, and with prominent breasts.🔽The right hands hold the individual hand implements:🔽the lotus, vajra, jewel, wheel, and sword.

original: g.yas pa rang rtags phyag mtshhan 'dzin/_/g.yon pa thod pa bdud rtshis bkang //
analyzed: g.yas pa rang rtags phyag mtshhan 'dzin/_/g.yon pa thod pa bdud rtshis bkang //
translated: The left hands hold skull cups filled with blood,🔽presenting them to the fathers, and embracing them in the cross-legged posture.

original: yab la stob cing skyil krungs 'khril/_/yab kyi 'od zer dkar ba'i mdog_/
analyzed: yab la stob cing skyil krungs 'khril/_/yab kyi 'od zer dkar ba'i mdog_/

analyzed: med pa'i sbyor mtshhams nas/_/byang sems dkar dmar bdud rtshi'i rgyun/_/

analyzed: rang gi gnas gsum phog pa yis/_/lus ngag yid gsum sdig sgrib dag_/
translated: Since it strikes one’s three places, the body, voice, and mind are purified of negativities and obscurations.

original: thun mong ma yin dbang bzhi thob/_/rang lus zag med bde bas rgyas/_/ye
analyzed: thun mong ma yin dbang bzhi thob/_/rang lus zag med bde bas rgyas/_/ye
translated: One obtains the four uncommon empowerments, and one’s body is filled with uncontaminated bliss.🔽The jñānasattva is generated as the protector in one’s body.

original: shes lus la mgon por bskyed/_/shar phyogs khyams la rdo rje'i rigs/_/khro bo
analyzed: shes lus la mgon por bskyed/_/shar phyogs khyams la rdo rje'i rigs/_/khro bo

analyzed: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/_/mdog dmar phyag g.yas rdo rje bsnams/

analyzed: g.yon pa ra ga'i bum pa bsnams/_/sbrul dang rin chen sna tshhogs brgyan/_/me

analyzed: ri 'bar ba'i rlong dkyil gnas/_/g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang bzhengs pa'o/_/

analyzed: yum kyang mdog dmar rdo rje dang /_/bum pa 'dzin cing yab la 'khyud/_/khro
translated: The mother is also red, holding a vajra and a vase, and embracing the father.🔽Think of them as wrathful and slightly passionate.

original: zhing cung zad dgyes par bsam/_/lho phyogs su ni rin chen rigs/_/yab
analyzed: zhing cung zad dgyes par bsam/_/lho phyogs su ni rin chen rigs/_/yab

analyzed: yum g.yas pa rin po che/_/g.yon na tshhe'i bum pa bsnams/_/nub phyogs
translated: The father and mother hold a jewel in the right hand and a treasure vase in the left.🔽In the west is the Buddha family.

analyzed: bud+d+ha'i khro bo ni/_/yab yum g.yas pa 'khor lo ste/_/g.yon pa tshhe'i bum pa bsnams/_/byang shar 'phrin las khro bo ni/_/yab yum g.yas pa rgya gram

analyzed: bsnams/_/g.yon pa tshhe'i bum pa bsnams/_/dbus kyi steng dang 'og tu ni/_/

analyzed: khro bo yab yum g.yas pa ni/_/pad+ma 'dab lnga bsnams pa ste/_/g.yon pa tshhe'i
translated: The right hand holds a five-petaled lotus, and the left holds a treasure vase.🔽Meditate on two wrathful ones in each of the four directions.

original: bum pa'o/_/phyogs bzhi khro bo gnyis gnyis bsgom/_/rgyan dang cha lugs sku
analyzed: bum pa'o/_/phyogs bzhi khro bo gnyis gnyis bsgom/_/rgyan dang cha lugs sku
translated: Think of the ornaments, attire, and body colors🔽as in the east.

original: mdog rnams/_/shar phyogs bzhin du bsam par bya/_/sgo ma bzhi ni mdog
analyzed: mdog rnams/_/shar phyogs bzhin du bsam par bya/_/sgo ma bzhi ni mdog
translated: The four gate guardians are

analyzed: dmar zhing /_/zhal ni phyir gzigs khro mo'o/_/gtsho bo lnga dang khro bcu'i/_/ bum pa dag la dmigs nas ni/_/gsang ba'i sngags ni bzlas par bya/_/om
translated: Focusing on the vases of the five families and the ten wrathful ones,🔽recite the secret mantra:🔽Om hrīḥ hūṃ svabhāva śuddhaḥ sarvadharma svabhāva śuddho’haṃ.

original: hri hum swa bye a/_dza hum bam ho/_a pa ra mi ta a yu dz+nya na ma ha si ti/_ha sa
analyzed: hri hum swa bye a/_dza hum bam ho/_a pa ra mi ta a yu dz+nya na ma ha si ti/_ha sa
translated: Jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ. Aparimita āyuḥ jñāna mahā siddhi.🔽Hā saṃ niri svāhā.

original: ni ri swa ha/_de skad ma yengs bzlas pa yis/_/bum pa'i chu rgyun spyi bor phog_/
analyzed: ni ri swa ha/_de skad ma yengs bzlas pa yis/_/bum pa'i chu rgyun spyi bor phog_/
translated: By reciting this without distraction, the stream of water from the vase touches the crown of one’s head.

original: tshhe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
analyzed: tshhe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
translated: Sādhana of Amitāyus🔽Sins and obscurations are purified, and the four empowerments are obtained.

original: sdig sgrib dag nas dbang bzhi thob/_/de nas rang nyid yab yum du/_/gsal
analyzed: sdig sgrib dag nas dbang bzhi thob/_/de nas rang nyid yab yum du/_/gsal
translated: Then, oneself appears as the father and mother,🔽and one recites the secret mantra.

original: la gsang ba'i sngags bzlas so/_/shar dang byang shar mtshhams su ni/_/bum pa
analyzed: la gsang ba'i sngags bzlas so/_/shar dang byang shar mtshhams su ni/_/bum pa
translated: In the northeast corner,🔽the vase is visualized as the deity as before.

original: lhar gnas gong bzhin bsam/_/rang dang lha rnams sngags zlos bsam/_/
analyzed: lhar gnas gong bzhin bsam/_/rang dang lha rnams sngags zlos bsam/_/
translated: One imagines oneself and the deities reciting the mantra.

original: 'chi med bdud rtshis bum pa khengs/_/rjes su lha rnams zhu ba'i chus/_/rang
analyzed: 'chi med bdud rtshis bum pa khengs/_/rjes su lha rnams zhu ba'i chus/_/rang
translated: The vase is filled with the nectar of immortality.

original: gzhan thams cad khrus bya'o/_/de yis mchog dang thun mong gi/_/dngos grub
analyzed: gzhan thams cad khrus bya'o/_/de yis mchog dang thun mong gi/_/dngos grub
translated: From this, all common and supreme🔽accomplishments will arise.

original: thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de nas kho na nyid 'di bsgrub/_/lus gnad
analyzed: thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de nas kho na nyid 'di bsgrub/_/lus gnad
translated: Then, practice this reality.🔽The body posture and tummo🔽are the same.

original: gtum mo bzhin du bya/_/rang nyid mgon por gsal ba yis/_/gsang gnas
analyzed: gtum mo bzhin du bya/_/rang nyid mgon por gsal ba yis/_/gsang gnas
translated: In the secret place,🔽in a triangular source of phenomena,

original: chos 'byung gru gsum du/_/hridang ram las me 'bar bas/_/khong pa'i nang🔽rnams thams cad khengs/_/spyi bo ham brgyad zhu ba las/_/bde chen bdud rtshi'i
analyzed: chos 'byung gru gsum du/_/hridang ram las me 'bar bas/_/khong pa'i nang rnams thams cad khengs/_/spyi bo ham brgyad zhu ba las/_/bde chen bdud rtshi'i
translated: from hrih and ram, fire blazes,🔽filling the whole inside of the body.🔽The eight hams at the crown melt,🔽and a stream of elixir of great bliss falls,🔽filling the channels, and bliss increases.

original: rgyun babs pas/_/rtsha rnams khengs pas bde ba rgyas/_/drod dang bde ba'i
analyzed: rgyun babs pas/_/rtsha rnams khengs pas bde ba rgyas/_/drod dang bde ba'i
translated: All the special heat and bliss🔽are called the key point of the upper and lower winds.

original: khyad par kun/_/steng 'og rlung gi gnad ces bya/_/rta bdun ri bong rgyas
analyzed: khyad par kun/_/steng 'og rlung gi gnad ces bya/_/rta bdun ri bong rgyas
translated: Having applied the seal of the rabbit on the seven horses,🔽ultimately the three spontaneous actualities are attained,

original: btab nas/_/mthar thug lhun grub rnam gsum thob/_/bcu gsum sa rnams
analyzed: btab nas/_/mthar thug lhun grub rnam gsum thob/_/bcu gsum sa rnams
translated: and the thirteen stages are perfected.🔽The practice of the Bhagavat Amitabha

original: rdzogs par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das tshhe dpag tu med pa'i bsgrub thabs/
analyzed: rdzogs par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das tshhe dpag tu med pa'i bsgrub thabs/
translated: The Bhagavat’s immeasurable means of accomplishment.🔽

original: ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//🔽bsdur mchand /_/bsdur mchan/🔽mtshhan byang 'di chos tshhan 'di'i mtshhan bod skad du smos pa ltar bkod/_pe 'bum/
analyzed: ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so//_// bsdur mchand /_/bsdur mchan/ mtshhan byang 'di chos tshhan 'di'i mtshhan bod skad du smos pa ltar bkod/_pe 'bum/
translated: The dakini of Timeless Awareness, Drupé Gyalmo, has composed this.🔽The following is a list of the texts in this volume, in Tibetan and English.

original: pe pan/_pe 'khrug_pe steng /_pe rta/_pe dkyil/'di'i 'og gi
analyzed: pe pan/_pe 'khrug_pe steng /_pe rta/_pe dkyil/'di'i 'og gi
translated: The Tibetan terms for the texts in this volume are listed here in the order in which they appear in the original Tibetan edition.

original: skyil krung zhes pa rnams pe la dkyil krung zhes 'khod kyang
analyzed: skyil krung zhes pa rnams pe la dkyil krung zhes 'khod kyang
translated: The Tibetan term for “full lotus” is “kyil trunk,” but in the Peking edition, the term is written as “kyil trunk.”
